example.parse: (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC لَجْنَةً)) (PP (PREP بِ-) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN -رِئاسَةِ) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رَئِيسِ) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوُزَراءِ)))))) (VP (FUT+IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I سَتُشْرِفُ) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *T*)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (DEM_PRON_F ه`ذِهِ) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المُفاوَضاتِ)))))
